document: The Dursleys are obsessed with appearances and social status{tuple_delimiter} They put a lot of effort into making a good impression on the wealthy couple coming for dinner, even going so far as to rehearse compliments and Dudley's "hero essay."
Harry is different from his family {tuple_delimiter} He has green eyes, black hair, and a lightning-shaped scar that sets him apart.

Harry feels lonely and neglected on his birthday {tuple_delimiter} He doesn't receive any cards or presents, and the Dursleys treat him poorly.  He misses his friends Ron and Hermione from Hogwarts, who haven't written to him all summer.
